title: [1.6.2~1.5.1][Forge][SSP/SMP]Pam的农场mod（更多作物）
author: npfjcg
txt_content:
Pam的mod是在1.4.6和1.4.7时代就很流行的农业mod
mod介绍（机翻+修改）

炊具烤盘，锅，菜板，研钵   榨汁机，搅拌机，煎锅，奶锅 普通农作物列表：芦笋，豆类，甜菜，西兰花，芹菜，大蒜，生姜，生菜，洋葱，花生，菠萝，萝卜，水稻（水生植物），甘薯，茶叶，萝卜   1.6.2：大麦，菜花，韭菜，燕麦，欧洲防风草，黑麦，葱段，大豆 多次生作物：[size=-1]甜，甜瓜，辣椒，咖啡，玉米，黄瓜，茄子，芥菜，豌豆，番茄，西葫芦  图片中缺少1.6.2：蓟，抱子甘蓝，卷心菜，冬瓜，秋葵 树: 苹果，鳄梨，香蕉，樱桃，肉桂，椰子，火龙果，柠檬，酸橙，芒果，豆蔻，橄榄，橙，木瓜，桃，梨，胡椒，梅花，石榴，杨桃，香荚兰豆，核桃灌木列表: 黑莓，蓝莓*，仙人掌果品*，蔓越莓，葡萄*，*猕猴桃，树莓*，Spiceleaf，草莓*，向日葵，白蘑菇  1.6.2版本，图中缺少：大黄，大头菜，海藻   *标有星号的灌木是重新生长作物    树是如何工作的


果树区 
 这些图片是果实生长阶段的参考。 水果根据生物群落可以生长在三种不同类型的树木。 


Weee! 花朵
这个mod增加了14个新花，自然生成，让游戏多一点颜色。 您还可以使用花的种子，种植和种植更多的鲜花就像小麦一样。 在1.5.2或更高版本，你也可以制作使用三花开花的藤蔓拿到六藤蔓每个各具特色的地方。  1.6.2或更高版本，现在所有作物使用瓷砖实体（所以他们采取了1块ID），如果你有安装GalatiCraft，外来鲜花将在月球上繁殖！ 可以在配置文件中修改的名花（正常和月亮）1.6.2
还有谁都不要的升级报告July 25th, 2013 - Mob Drop Crops 1.6.2 v1.0 - Release of this donation mod!  See mod info below for information.
July 24th, 2013 - HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.07
- Fixed a horrible world destroying crash with the presser that was caused by trying to put stuff into the entry slot when items were already in the bottom that didn't match the top slot's new recipe.  You must now remove all items in the bottom to continue pressing if there's nothing in the top.  If an item is already in the top, you can keep adding that same item.
July 22nd, 2013 - HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.06
- Please use the latest Forge download
- Fixed crash when opening Apiary and Presser
July 22nd, 2013 - Weee! Flowers 1.6.2 v1.03
- Added the ability to re-name flowers and moon flowers in the config
HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.05
- OMG BEES
- Beehives now generate infrequently on trees in most biomes, break them to get a queen bee (change rarity in config file)
- You can build an apiary (see recipe text file) for your queen bee, placing her in there and waiting will generate honey and wax combs.  Having flowers (anything that extends BlockFlower it seems) will make her work faster!  This is a slow process so don't get frustrated.
- Making a presser (see recipe text file) will allow you to press honey and wax combs into honey and beeswax.  Beeswax works like candleberry wax in all recipes.  You can also use the press to press fruit into their fruit juice items, olives/sunflower seeds/walnuts into cooking oil, reeds and beets into sugar, and wood of all types into paper
-Currently the presser doesn't understand the Ore Dictionary so other fruits/etc from mods won't work at this time
-Olive Oil has been re-named cooking oil
-You can now use the juicer to turn sunflower seeds and walnuts into cooking oil
-Known Bug:  Beehives, apiaries, and pressers are all named 'Presser' in-game
-Not a Bug:  Anyhting can be placed in the top of the presser. If the little progress bar doesn't fill, the item doesn't have a recipe.

July 20th, 2013 - I've updated the first half of the recipes text file for HarvestCraft to be less filled with Java.  Will work on the food recipes when I have more time.  If you cannot read it now, I cannot help you.  I am also not making picture recipes because there is over 300 recipes.  No.
July 19th, 2013 - Weee! Flowers 1.6.2 v1.02
- Fixed server start crash
July 17th, 2013 - HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.04
- Fixed server start crash
July 17th, 2013 - HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.03
- Regenerate your pamharvestcraft.cfg file, again
- Fixed pear trees generating with jungle wood
- Fixed tree 'fruit' blocks not dropping any items
- Fixed tree 'fruit' blocks turning into walnut 'fruit' blocks when broken
- Fixed rice item overwriting rice seed item
- Fixed cinnamon 'fruit' block rendering as a flower
- Fixed nutmeg sapling masquerading as an olive sapling
- Fixed kiwi jelly sandwich using a Block ID
- Removed fruit blocks from Creative tabs till their icons and names are fixed
- Known Bug: My crop blocks are immune to sword breakage and trying to break them with some mod sword items may cause a crash
July 16th, 2013 - HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.02 
- Regenerate your pamharvestcraft.cfg file
- Fixed issue with getting toast instead of an iron shovel
- Fixed issues with hardened leather armor configs and them being considered food
July 16th, 2013 - HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.01 - Fixed an issue with non-food items not registering correctly in the Ore Dictionary, added changelog text file to ZIP file, added complete recipe list to ZIP file
Weee! Flowers 1.6.2 v1.01 - Added changelog to text file

July 15th, 2013 - HarvestCraft 1.6.2 v1.00 - Omg, so much to write.
- IF COMING FROM 1.5.2 WORLD YOU NEED TO BREAK ALL CROPS AND UNMAKE ALL SEED PACKETS, SEED BOXES, AND ALL STORAGE BOXES OF ALL TYPES
- Seed packets, seed boxes, and storage boxes no longer exist.  Storage boxes (along with vanilla storage boxes) will come back in a later update
- You're also gonna have to re-generate your config file to get all the new options and not make the game crash.
- All crops are now tile entities, which frees up a lot of Block IDs
- Added sixteen new crops, three of which are bushes (listed under the out of data photos below)
- Merged everything together and updated the config file to make everything customizable in terms of turning things on and off instead of deleting files (LOOK AT THE CONFIG FILE BEFORE ASKING QUESTIONS)
- You can set the food restore and saturation restore of all crop, bush, and tree items
- Took out carpets for 1.6.2 vanilla carpets
- All item and block IDs remain the same except for the crops, which have been condensed into a single ID
- Normal crops can now be set to drop 2-4 crop items or 1 crop item and 1-3 seeds like wheat in the config file
- All crops now plant in tilled soil till a later udpate

July 15th, 2013 - Weee! Flowers 1.6.2 v1.01 - Added bonemeal fix for Iguana_man's Hunger Overhaul users and flowered vines should be useable as ladders again.
July 11th, 2013 - Weee! Flowers has been updated to 1.6.2  Before you install, make back-ups and if you are using a 1.5.2 world, you MUST BREAK ALL FLOWER CROPS.  If you don't either the game will crash or they will all disappear.  You will need to re-gen your config file as well to get the new options.  All the crops now take up block ID 4001, moon flowers now take up 4002.  All other IDs have stayed the same.  Don't worry about moon flowers unless you have GalatiCraft installed.  Moon flowers can be turned off by setting the moonflowerRarity to 0 and they can be turned into dyes just like normal flowers.  They have no crops, however.  EDIT:  Re-download Weee! Flowers if you crash going to the Moon.  I fixed it!
July 8th, 2013 - All mods except HarvestCraft and Weee! Flowers have been updated to 1.6.2  Pam Hates Snow has been discontinued until I can get it to work properly in the new versions.  Please re-generate your config files and make sure to follow the new Forge installation directions correctly.  Only changes to any mods was to Simple Recipes, which added balanced recipes for Name Tags, all three horse armors, and Saddles.下载
